function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contractual ambiguity regarding contractors' entitlements during a virus outbreak","Impact":"Contractors may face financial losses and disputes due to lack of clarity in the contract","Mitigation":"Clearly define force majeure clauses to include virus outbreaks and specify entitlements during such events","Technologies":"Legal expertise and professional contract drafting","People":"Contractors, clients, and legal experts","Owner":"Legal experts, government, and contracting parties"},{"Description":"Financial impact on contractors due to delay in projects and economic instability","Impact":"Contractors may suffer from reduced income opportunities and financial instability","Mitigation":"Increase government spending on development projects, provide financial support to contractors, and stimulate the economy","Technologies":"Financial support programs, economic stimulus packages, and budget allocation for development projects","People":"Contractors, government officials, and financial experts","Owner":"Government and financial institutions"}]}
